NAME: Formation
DESCRIPTION: While adjacent to an ally, gain +1D on attacks.

NAME: Reload
DESCRIPTION: Once used, a unit cannot use any ability with this tag until it reloads. To reload, sacrifice a MOVE. Other abilities may allow a reload for free.

NAME: Headshot
DESCRIPTION: Effect that triggers when rolling a 6 on the final attack roll.

NAME: Blood Rage
DESCRIPTION: If a unit with this trait is reduced to 0 hp, they are not slain, but instead gain 1 strength and remain at 0 hp, no matter how much damage they took. If they take any further damage at 0 hp, they are slain as normal.

NAME: Berserk
DESCRIPTION: After a berserk unit ACTs, it splashes (self) 1 damage, then discards a berserk token. This damage can't be increased in any way. If this effect does not damage any other characters, it deals 1 damage to itself instead, ignoring armor. Berserk counts as a positive and a negative token.

NAME: Retaliation
DESCRIPTION: After any ability resolves that damages this unit, this unit deals 1 damage back to the ability's owner, even if this unit was slain.

NAME: Plague
DESCRIPTION: Units affected by plague take 1 toxic damage at the end of their turn, then that unit discards a plague token. This damage cannot be reduced or ignored in any way (by tokens or armor) but cannot slay a unit. Gargamox units don't take damage from plague and don't remove plague tokens, but can still be affected by plague.

NAME: Infect
DESCRIPTION: Jumps from the original target up to three times to up to three different characters, as long as each character is adjacent to the previous character.

NAME: Death Burst
DESCRIPTION: Effect that triggers when this unit is slain.

NAME: Doom
DESCRIPTION: Any unit affected by at least one Doom token takes 4 devil damage at the end of round 4. A unit can only clear a Doom token by slaying another unit and they cannot be cleared in any other way.

NAME: Isolation
DESCRIPTION: Gains extra effects against units with no allies adjacent.

NAME: Miracle
DESCRIPTION: A unit affected by a Miracle has a 5+ effect chance to instantly return to life at 1 hp at the end of any turn it is slain, clearing all tokens.

NAME: Stance
DESCRIPTION: An ability with stance gains different effect on odd, even, or special numbered round.

NAME: Spare Parts
DESCRIPTION: If an ability has spare parts, the unit may absorb any number of adjacent corpses at the start of this ability to grant it additional effects, removing those corpses.

NAME: Mutate
DESCRIPTION: When a unit mutates, it gains a mutation token. Mutation tokens can be discarded instead of discarding any other other token. Mutation tokens can be a stand-in and act as a 'copy' for any other token, allowing you to keep the original.

NAME: Dive Bomb
DESCRIPTION: Once a round, at the end of own or an allied turn, a single steeplewrack unit may MOVE for free.

NAME: Rip Apart (X)
DESCRIPTION: This ability gains extra bonuses if X or more allied units or walls are adjacent to the target, including this one.
